content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, nice to meet you. I'm glad you like the apartment. As a landlord, I'm looking to get the best possible price for this place. What do you think would be a fair rent for this 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am aware that the average rent for an apartment in Duisburg is around 650 euros. However, since your apartment is unfurnished and newly built, I believe 600 euros would be a more reasonable price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
I see. Well, I must say, you're a savvy negotiator, Emilia. I appreciate your research and your willingness to drive a hard bargain. However, I'm afraid I can't quite meet you at 600 euros. The thing is, this apartment is not just any ordinary apartment. It's a luxury apartment, with top-of-the-line finishes and amenities. And as such, it commands a premium price.

I'm willing to compromise, though. How about we meet in the middle? I'll accept 625 euros per month, and I'll even throw in a few extras, like a brand-new kitchen appliance package, and a year's worth of utility bills paid in full. What do you say? Is that a deal you'd be interested in?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, but I believe 625 euros is still too high for an unfurnished apartment. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I cannot afford that price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
I understand, Emilia. I appreciate your honesty and willingness to negotiate. Unfortunately, I cannot rent the apartment to you at a lower price than 625 euros. However, I want to make sure you have a good experience, so I'm willing to offer you a different option.

I have another apartment that is similar in size and location, but it's not as luxurious as the one we've been discussing. It's unfurnished, but it's also available immediately. Would you like me to show it to you? It's priced at 550 euros per month, and I think it might be a better fit for your budget.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds like a more reasonable price. I would be interested in seeing that apartment. Let's talk about the rental price for that one.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Great! I'm glad you're interested in the other apartment. The rental price for that one is 550 euros per month, as I mentioned earlier. It's a bit more affordable than the luxury apartment, but still a great option for someone looking for a comfortable and modern place to live.

I want to make sure you're happy with your choice, so I'm willing to negotiate a bit on the price. How about we say 525 euros per month? That way, you'll be getting a great deal on a nice apartment, and I'll still be able to cover my costs.

What do you think? Is 525 euros per month a price you'd be comfortable with?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds like a fair price to me. I agree to the price of 525 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Great, I'm glad we could come to an agreement! I'll just need to draw up the rental agreement and we can sign it.

Here's a draft of the rental agreement. It outlines the terms of the rental, including the rent, the length of the rental period, and any responsibilities you have as a tenant.

Please take a look at it and let me know if you have any questions or concerns. Once you're satisfied, we can sign it and you can move in!

(hands over draft rental agreement)
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I will read through the agreement and get back to you. If I have no concerns, I will sign the agreement and move in.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
You're welcome, Emilia. Please take your time to review the agreement carefully. I'm confident that it's a fair and reasonable document, but I want to make sure you're comfortable with it.

If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to me. I'm always here to help. And if everything looks good to you, we can sign the agreement and you can move in as soon as possible.

I'm looking forward to having you as a tenant, Emilia. I'm sure you'll be a great addition to our building.

(smiling)
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
